snippet: After undergoing two heart transplants, Erik Compton said “hitting a tee shot on 18” at the United States Open is not that big of a deal.
abstract: Back story of golfer Erik Compton, who as a youngster had two heart transplants, has earned him more attention than his scores; after playing his way into contention with his second consecutive sub-70 score at the United States Open, he is hopeful that his golf finally will get its due.
lead_paragraph: After undergoing two heart transplants, Erik Compton said “hitting a tee shot on 18” at the United States Open is not that big of a deal.

headline.seo: Erik Compton Is Undaunted at U.S. Open
headline.main: Pinehurst Scary? Not After Heart Surgery
headline.print_headline: Pinehurst Scary? Not After Heart Surgery
